title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Saturday, with Jannik Sinner, Casper Ruud and Alex de Minaur winning their opening matches. Fabian Marozsan defeated Andrey Rublev and Marcos Giron stunned Taylor Fritz. View all the Rome tennis results from Saturday below. excerpt: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued Saturday, with Jannik Sinner, Casper Ruud and Alex de Minaur winning their opening matches. Find out all results from the day.
text: Rome Sinner, Ruud, De Minaur win opening matches May 10, 2025 Getty Images The Internazionali BNL d'Italia is the fifth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Saturday, with Jannik Sinner, Casper Ruud and Alex de Minaur winning their opening matches. Fabian Marozsan defeated Andrey Rublev and Marcos Giron stunned Taylor Fritz. View all the Rome tennis results from Saturday below. html:
Rome

Sinner, Ruud, De Minaur win opening matches

May 10, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia is the fifth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Saturday, with Jannik Sinner, Casper Ruud and Alex de Minaur winning their opening matches. Fabian Marozsan defeated Andrey Rublev and Marcos Giron stunned Taylor Fritz.

View all the Rome tennis results from Saturday below.

Results - Saturday, 10 May 2025
